001
002/**
003 * Décrivez votre classe Letter ici.
004 *
005 * @author Anthony Pradier
006 * @version 04/15/2024
007 */
008public class Letter extends Item {
009    private static int COUNT = 1;
010    
011    private Player aAuthor;
012    private Player aTarget;
013    private String aContent;
014    
015    public Letter(final Player pAuthor, final Player pTarget, final String pContent) {
016        super("Lettre" + COUNT, "Lettre de " + pAuthor.getName() + " adressée à " + pTarget.getName(), 0.002, 400, true, false, false);
017        this.aAuthor = pAuthor;
018        this.aTarget = pTarget;
019        this.aContent = "Lettre adressée à " + this.aTarget + ", de la part de " + this.aAuthor + "\n\n" + pContent;
020        
021        COUNT += 1;
022    }
023    
024    public String getContent() {
025        return this.aContent;
026    }
027}
